attributes.action: CITIZENS THAT WANT TO SIGN ON AFTER 3 MONTHS..Should be made to provide public services...
attributes.additional_details:
Citizens that want to sign on after 3 months should be made to provide public services....

The members of the public that decide to sign on for being out of work should be made to provide the public services that Britain needs, after a 3 month period.

3 months, this could be changed to incorporate the average amount of time it takes to find a job.

For the people that don't want to work, should be made to get up in the morning and do a full days work such as;

> Providing safe road crossings
> Cleaning the streets
> Emptying our bins
> Having the choice to join the army
> Delivering our post

£££ think of how much money the government could save!
